item.title: Project 1: Car Selling Price Estimator
item.description: Created a tool that estimates the car selling price based on dataset from CarDekho.com Imported dataset from kaggle with rougly 10000 data points. Performed Feature Engineering, Feature Selection, Data cleaning and EDA to prepare the dataset. Used RandomForestRegressor and Hyperparamter tuning to predict selling price based on 8 features with an accuracy of 81%. Deployed the app using flask on Heroku Dashboard Link to app:(https://carsellingprice00.herokuapp.com/) -Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project 2: Flight Price Prediction
item.description: Created a tool that estimates the prices of Flights in India based on dataset from kaggle. Imported dataset from kaggle with rougly 10000 data points. Performed Feature Engineering, Feature Selection, Data cleaning and EDA to prepare the dataset. Used RandomForestRegressor and Hyperparamter tuning to predict flight prices for number of airlines including JetAirways, Indigo, SpiceJet, Vistara etc based on features such as Stopage, Source, Destination, Duration etc.with an accuracy of 79%.

item.title: Project 3: Google Play Store Analysis
item.description: Performed a comprehensive analysis of apps and reviews on Google play store for over ten thousand apps. Used the data to do data cleaning, exploration and find popularity of apps based on 13 features. Used sentimental analysis on user reviews. Link to GitHub Repository
